home.heroInfo: We offer customers the ability to launch advertisement campaigns via airdrop along with the chosen incentive fee to a determined set of addresses that interact with a given contract.

process1.title: Select target
process1.info: Select target addresses by providing a contract address, and upload promotional flyer to IPFS.

process2.title: Create campaign
process2.info: Campaign is created via a transaction to Airvertise contract, including campaign information along target addresses and individual fees.

process3.title: Claim reward
process3.info: Users get notified about airdrop, they open the flyer and they collect the fee.

home.feature1: NFTs is a revolutionary way of accessing events. The provide a secure and tamper-proof tickets, eliminating the possibility of counterfeit and scalping. NFTs also provide a secure and reliable resold system on the open market for a fair price.
home.feature2: Airdrops are great way for spreading the word about your collection and providing an incentive for people to engage with it. Offer exclusive airdrops as small rewards so people keep up with the collection.
home.feature3: Token gated access for digital products where an NFT functions as a subscription for users
home.leftImageText: Start scaling your business by identifying and building an audience. Knowing your audience will help you create campaigns and increase your customer base.
